spells.description: Use: Hunter be nimble, Hunter be quick. Hunter invoke the power of the candlestick to increase movement speed by 20% and Haste by 6,311 for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Carefully balance the Egg's incubation. While stationary, gain 162 Agility every 1 sec, up to 30 times. Diminishes while moving. While moving, gain 152 of your highest secondary stat every 1 sec, up to 30 times. Diminishes while stationary. 

Additional stacks above 20 grant 60% reduced benefit.
Use: Suspend the Egg's incubation state for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
